CustomField.description: If selected, and the Display Schedule Options Window for the Resourcing component is enabled, users can select whether to retain the preferred schedule on the resource request when holding a resource. If selected, and the Lightning App Builder property is disabled, the preferred schedule is retained automatically when holding a resource.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If selected, and the Display Schedule Options Window for the Resourcing component is enabled, users can select whether to retain the preferred schedule on the resource request when holding a resource. If selected, and the Lightning App Builder property is disabled, the preferred schedule is retained automatically when holding a resource.
CustomField.label: Retain Schedule On Hold
